channel.description: Recent content in digitaldivide on C'est la Z

item.title: Keyboarding and the Digital Divide
item.description: My friend Adam posted this link to an article on the new digital divide the other day. It's talking about young people who do everything on the phone so aren't familiar or comfortable with a traditional keyboard/mouse computer setup. In the comments there were some of us who lamented about the term "digital natives" and the idea that kids these days know all about computers and technology. This led me to think about a couple of things.
